    • Method Detail

      • gotoTransition

        boolean gotoTransition(PathName aSignalName,
                     java.math.BigInteger aTimeOffset)
                       throws ZamiaException
        Set simulation cursor to the given signal and to the a time offset of the next transition after aTimeOffset. This function can be slow since it may require the simulation data provider to do random file access when you want to retrieve values for the new offset. For speed it is recommended you call this function once to select a signal and a start time offset and then use gotoNextTransition() to retrieve information on subsequent signal transitions.
        Parameters:
        aSignalName - PathName of signal the value is being requested for
        aTimeOffset - time offset the value is being requested for
        Returns:
        true if a corresponding transition was found, false otherwise (unknown signal)
        Throws:
        ZamiaException

      • gotoNextTransition

        java.math.BigInteger gotoNextTransition(java.math.BigInteger aTimeLimit)
                                        throws ZamiaException
        Place simulation cursor at the next logged transition of the current signal relative to the current time offset. To select a different signal or request information on an arbitrary time offset, use gotoTransition().
        Parameters:
        aTimeLimit: - if != null: search no further than this time limit
        Returns:
        time offset the reported transition happend, in fs or sim end time, if no further events have been logged
        Throws:
        ZamiaException

      • gotoPreviousTransition

        java.math.BigInteger gotoPreviousTransition(java.math.BigInteger aTimeLimit)
                                            throws ZamiaException
        Place simulation cursor at the previous logged transition of the current signal relative to the current time offset. To select a different signal or request information on an arbitrary time offset, use gotoTransition().
        Parameters:
        aTimeLimit - if != null: search no further than this time limit
        Returns:
        time offset the reported transition happened, in fs or sim start time, if no further events have been logged
        Throws:
        ZamiaException

      • getCurrentTime

        java.math.BigInteger getCurrentTime()
                                    throws ZamiaException
        Get the current simulation time offset
        Returns:
        current simulation time offset
        Throws:
        ZamiaException

      • getCurrentValue

        IGStaticValue getCurrentValue()
                              throws ZamiaException
        Get simulation value of current signal at the current time.
        Returns:
        Simulation value requested if available, null otherwise
        Throws:
        ZamiaException

      • isEvent

        boolean isEvent()
        Check current signal for event at the current time.
        Returns:
        true if signal has an event at the current time, false otherwise

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Call this method to free resources allocated to this sim cursor when it is no longer needed
